nodes.description: 2012年3月31日，Yala省繁忙购物中心发生卡车炸弹袭击
nodes.support_text: The first attack involved a truck bomb that ripped through a busy shopping district in Yala.

nodes.description: 同日约20分钟后，Yala省救援现场发生摩托车炸弹爆炸，造成多数伤亡
nodes.support_text: About 20 minutes later, a second bomb planted in a motorcycle exploded as rescuers convened at the site of the original bombing.

nodes.description: 随后Yala省汽车炸弹引燃周边建筑，导致11人死亡110人受伤
nodes.support_text: Later, a third explosion from a device placed in a car set fire to nearby buildings.

nodes.description: 同日Hat Yai市Lee Gardens Plaza酒店地下室发生汽车炸弹爆炸，误判为气体泄漏后确认为袭击，致4人死亡416人受伤
nodes.support_text: Following the bombings in Songkhla, an explosion in the basement Lee Gardens Plaza Hotel damaged that building and an adjacent McDonald's in Hat Yai...
